title: Ronaldo's unlikely friendship with Ed Sheeran
text:
Ronaldo's unlikely friendship with Ed Sheeran Getty Images 0 07-Mar-2017 01:25:38 The former World Player of the Year first met the Brit Award-winning pop star after a show in 2015, and the pair intend to be reunited later this year 
Footballers mingling with pop stars is nothing new, with top performers in two of the world’s most popular entertainment businesses often crossing paths. 
When you think of such meetings, though, it is the unions of David and Victoria Beckham, Ashley and Cheryl Cole or Gerard Pique and Shakira that immediately spring to mind. 
Sometimes, however, iconic figures from two very different walks of life can form the unlikeliest of bonds. 
In May 2017, two such personalities are hoping to be reunited. 
One of those men is a former World Player of the Year and World Cup winner from Brazil, while the other is a Brit Award-winning artist who hails from Suffolk. A post shared by Celina Locks (@celinalocks) on May 1, 2015 at 7:13am PDT 
“I met Ronaldo and he came to my concert and invited us to his house which has a club in it,” Ipswich Town fan Ed Sheeran revealed to The Sun on his friendship with the ex-Barcelona and Real Madrid striker. 
“We went there and he showed me my dance routine from the Thinking Out Loud video. 
“He had learned it with his girlfriend, which was amazing.” 
Sheerhan, who appears set to head back to the top of the charts with his album Divide this week, is planning to meet up with Ronaldo and his other half Celina Locks again after a performance in May. 
He added: “I get to see him again, that’s exciting. I really like him. 
“He was so cool. I got a shirt signed from him and it says, ‘To Ed, you f***. Ronaldo’.” Related
